events.description: Reports indicated that plans for Iran nuclear talks were collapsing, ending hopes for a diplomatic resolution between Washington and Tehran.
The Energy Information Administration reported a decline in US crude inventories.
Iranian drones heading to a US aircraft carrier were intercepted.

facts.fact_text: WTI crude oil futures rose to $65 per barrel on Wednesday.

evidences.evidence_text: WTI crude oil futures rose to $65 per barrel on Wednesday

facts.fact_text: US crude inventories fell by 3.5 million barrels last week according to the EIA.

evidences.evidence_text: US crude inventories fell by 3.5 million barrels last week, according to the Energy Information Administration

facts.fact_text: The API estimated an 11.1 million barrel decline in crude inventories on Tuesday.

evidences.evidence_text: less than the 11.1 million barrel decline estimated by the API on Tuesday

claims.claim_text: Geopolitical tension between the US and Iran rekindled higher risk premiums.

evidences.evidence_text: geopolitical tension between the US and Iran rekindled higher risk premiums

claims.claim_text: OPEC forecasts a crude oil supply surplus this year.
claims.author: OPEC

evidences.evidence_text: OPEC forecasting a surplus this year

claims.claim_text: A further deterioration in the area could drive the US to enforce sanctions and Iran to intercept tankers.

evidences.evidence_text: A further deterioration in the area could drive the US to enforce its sanctions against Iran... and Iran to intercept tankers crossing the Straight of Hormuz

evidence.evidence_text: geopolitical tension between the US and Iran rekindled higher risk premiums
Reports indicated that plans for Iran nuclear talks were collapsing, erasing earlier signs that dialogue between Washington and Tehran could prevent military action
Crude Oil Rallies on Collapsing Iran Talks... US crude inventories fell by 3.5 million barrels last week
